(Last post for a while)

:Feline:

She smiled with a hint of evil in it. She showed one k-9 tooth when 
she smiled.
She twitched her tail and looked at Zardus. "If you would allow me to 
do so, I would like a drink. I am parched from the day's events. 
Please, May I have something to drink?"
